scripts.db:generate: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_postgresql.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:zod:generate: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_cockroachdb.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_zod.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:local: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_cockroachdb.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.local -- prisma migrate dev && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:reset:local: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_cockroachdb.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.local -- prisma migrate reset && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:studio:local: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_cockroachdb.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.local -- prisma studio && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:remote: cat src/prisma/partials/_datasource_cockroachdb.prisma.part src/prisma/partials/_models.prisma.part > src/prisma/schema.prisma && dotenv -e .env.remote -- prisma migrate deploy && rm src/prisma/schema.prisma
